name: Power in Flux: The History of Electric Motorcycles
blurb: A book about how technology, innovation, renewable energy and the electric powertrain transformed motorsports in the 21st century.

name: Platform4 bogprojektet
blurb: Vi laver en bog om Platform4, det kreative hus for kunst og teknologi - en fortælling om community, projekter og eksperimenter!

name: Fiera Magazine
blurb: Discovering new talent at the world's design fairs

name: Non Fiction Book: Life With a Traumatic Brain Injury
blurb: A collection of short stories originally published on Huffington Post to educate and bring awareness about traumatic brain injury

name: A History of the Great Empires of Eve Online
blurb: A narrative history book about the politics, warfare, betrayal, and culture that shaped the first decade of Eve Online.

name: The Riveter Magazine: Longform Storytelling by Women
blurb: The Riveter is a women's longform lifestyle magazine. Join us in promoting women in journalism and thoughtful content for readers.

name: Surveillance Valley: The Rise of the Google-Military Complex
blurb: A book by Yasha Levine about how Silicon Valley turned the Internet into the greatest surveillance apparatus in the history of mankind.

name: Obelisk - A Book on Art, Architecture, & Antiquities (New)
blurb: Please help print OBELISK: I. 36 articles on art, architecture, & antiquities. Hardcover, 240 pgs. Receive a copy w/a $75 donation!

name: The Happy Newspaper
blurb: A newspaper to celebrate all that's good in the world. 'The Happy Newspaper' is a platform to share positive news and wonderful people.

name: Kazoo magazine
blurb: A new kind of print magazine for girls—one that inspires them to be smart, strong, fierce, and, above all, true to themselves.

name: It Took a Village: A Memoir
blurb: Villagers in the Congo believe they brought me my daughter 18 years ago. Now we hope to return, to give thanks — and tell our story.

name: My American Education: Students Talk About Public School
blurb: This book will give voice to the prekindergarten through 12th-grade students of the U.S. public school system.

name: A book by Tiny House, Tiny Footprint
blurb: Roll with Kathleen, Greg + Blaize in a Camper Trailer, a book filled with stories and illustrations from our experiences living tiny.

name: (un)fold
blurb: a print publication to express the correlation between creative innovation and mental health through poetry, prose and photography

name: Faithfully Magazine: Celebrating Christians of Color
blurb: Faithfully Magazine centers conversations, issues and events Christians of color say are important to their faith and to their lives.

name: A NewsHound's Guide to Student Journalism
blurb: This comic book-style high school textbook makes learning journalism engaging and important.

name: A Kit to Start Small Live Big in 2017
blurb: This is a book about finding and beginning to live your Big Life.

name: Slime Trading Card Game
blurb: A collectible trading card game based on an adorable slime world.

name: Unearth Women: The 1st Travel Magazine For Women, By Women
blurb: A new quarterly travel publication that aims to champion female content creators and challenge the patriarchy one story at a time.

name: Loom Journals | A Parent-Child Heirloom
blurb: A revolutionary parent-child journal for parents who want more genuine connection and open communication with their children.

name: The Complete Virtual Boy: 100+ Page Color Hardcover Book!
blurb: The Ultimate Guide to Nintendo's red-screened stepchild! 100 pages of pure Virtual Boy madness covering All Regions and even Homebrew!

name: +41 – Schweizer Publikation
blurb: +41 ist eine Schweizer Publikation von wiewaersmalmit.ch – mit Interviews, Fotostrecken und Texten rund um Alltagskultur und Menschen.

name: Turf & Grain Magazine
blurb: An independently published, award-winning magazine that showcases the stories, ideas and experiences of the people of Ireland.

name: Sea Maven Magazine
blurb: A literary journal for all ocean lovers.

name: Gas Roots Magazine
blurb: A new motorcycle magazine specializing in lifestyle and builds.

name: Voyage Magazine -The Sustainability Issue
blurb: Our seventh issue explores the intersection between travel and sustainability.

name: Design Museum Magazine
blurb: A quarterly magazine on design impact.

name: The Heatons Post - free community newspaper for the Heatons
blurb: An independent monthly community newspaper for the Heatons to inform, inspire & connect the local community to what's happening locally

name: The Easy Way: Friday the 13th | An Unofficial NES Guide
blurb: An Unofficial Friday the 13th NES Strategy Guide so you can master the game "The Easy Way".

name: RACEWKND: A New Magazine for Formula 1 Fans!
blurb: Celebrate the circuits, cities, and culture of the race weekend, no matter where you are.

name: The Switch Collector: Volume Two (Nintendo Book Series)
blurb: The Second Volume of the Nintendo Switch Collector's Series! We cover every game released from MAR-SEP in Year 2 plus lots of treats!

name: Der Jahresrückblick 2020: unabhängig, eindeutig, einzigartig
blurb: Eine Zusammenfassung des letzten Jahres mit politischen Karikaturen, humorvoll und scharf gewürzt, neu und gnadenlos, in Farbe und bunt

name: Freelancer Magazine
blurb: A new print magazine dedicated to freelancers. It's a quarterly business and lifestyle magazine for a freelance life less ordinary.

name: Book of Thoughts
blurb: A book of poems and journal entries of my thoughts and experience living with Borderline Personality Disorder (BPD).

name: Fantasy Voice – la nuova rivista dell’informazione fantasy!
blurb: La nuova rivista dedicata all’informazione fantasy, con interviste, approfondimenti e le ultime uscite degli editori di fantastico.

name: Heiter Magazine: the print issue
blurb: Finding & celebrating joy has been more important than ever before. Help us bring the heiter print publication to life.

name: Trails Magazine
blurb: A new type of independent, print magazine for backpackers and people who sleep in the dirt.

name: E1M1 - Retro Shooter Magazine (Issues #13 - #15)
blurb: Love FPS games? E1M1 is covering more in brand new issues!

name: Fare Forward Print Subscription
blurb: Fare Forward is a Christian review of ideas. In the words of T.S. Eliot, we "consider the future and the past with an equal mind."
